items.headline: External Auditing : External Audit Process : Accounting Audit : Accounting Auditor : Business Valuation Methods : Audit
objectives_summary: The sole objective of this course is to learn the practical of how to audit financial statements rather just reading the theory.
We will audit a company from A to Z (Fieldwork)
An external audit is an independent examination of the financial statements prepared by the organisation. It is usually conducted for statutory purposes (because the law requires it)
